item.title: Intel Co.,Ltd., Big Data Technology
item.description: Software Engineer Intern (Jan 2019 â€“ July 2019): Spark, TensorFlow/Keras, Docker, Contributed to the development of Analytics Zoo, an open-source distributed deep learning platform: Built end-to-end distributed model pipelines of Analytics Zoo with BigDL, Spark, and TensorFlow Ported and dockerized TensorFlow projects to automatic distributed pipelines on Kubernetes cluster
